<!DOCTYPE html>
      <html lang="en">
      <head>
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
        <title>Fullscreen iFrame</title>
        <style>
          body, html {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            height: 100%;
            width: 100%;
            overflow: hidden;
          }
          iframe {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100vw;
            height: 100vh;
            border: none;
          }
        </style>
      </head>
      <body>
        <iframe id="innerFrame" 
                name="innerFrame" 
                sandbox="allow-scripts allow-popups allow-forms allow-same-origin allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-downloads allow-storage-access-by-user-activation" 
                allowfullscreen 
                src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/467GFAwZvR4?si=3Vc_cvdXqDRryaST">
        </iframe>
      </body>
      </html>
